Name: Boba Simulator : Idle Shop Management
About the game: Make your own Boba Tea recipe Let's figure out what is the best recipe. The better recipe, the more customers come to your shop. Upgrade shop and Extra topping Choose where to spend your earning. Each upgrade will help you grow faster in their own way. Manage your stock and storage You can buy Boba Tea ingredients from Supermarket. The bigger chunk you buy, the better price you get. Please keep your limited storage in mind. Hire staff to help you Staff can drastically improve your sales. Choose which one you want to hire from the candidate list. You can pay recruitment agency to get the list of professional candidates. Unlock a new branch Unlock a new branch will grant you access to new shop's features.
